ygData.subject: What happens when you go LD...
ygData.msgSnippet: ...fighting giants in FM the other night, I dinged 32.  About 3 or 4 kills later, I go linkdead.  I m in a full group, there is another full group just down
ygData.messageBody:
...fighting giants in FM the other night, I dinged 32. About 3 or 4 kills
later, I go linkdead. I'm in a full group, there is another full group just
down the wall from us. I figure I'm pretty safe, right?

I get back on after my cable modem stops having fits, and I'm at my bind
point, back to 31. I only grab a drum out of the stash. I won't need
invis, right? The giant fort is well camped, and my corpse will be just
inside, right?

Hehe...wrong! I get back to the spot, and it's nowhere in sight. I pulse
in a locate, and of course, it points me deep into the fort. I never
noticed the cave in the back. In I go. Oh, there it is, about halfway
down. How the heck did I get there! When I went LD, I was standing by the
wall whacking a giant!

Oh well.
